title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: CAI-Based Project for Mastering Database Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners explain database concepts (relational models, normalization, SQL) with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners design and implement ERDs in three or more practical projects based on theories learned through a CAI tutorial model.
Learners write and optimize complex SQL queries with 90% accuracy using a drill-and-practice model.

Learners can collaborate with 3–5 team members in a PBL environment to design a relational database system for solving real-world problems in public/nonprofit sectors (e.g., educational program management, resource allocation optimization) and complete a portfolio—including an ERD diagram, SQL query implementation, and data visualization dashboard (Tableau/Power BI)—within six months.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
